game.name: This Code Echoes
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This Code Echoes is a 2.5D platformer using weapons with directional attacks and multiple weapon slots for great combos. Battle your way through levels and face the bosses and get thier drops to get stronger and find your ultimate build!
